subject: Re: Fwd: Formatting work on the smart living website
preview: Hi Shonagh, All good. For hero banner images, the recommended size is 1920x1080px according to our Web Designer. However, that would also depend on how the photo was taken. Nevertheless, we can alw

full_threads.body:
Hi Shonagh, 

All good. For hero banner images, the recommended size is 1920x1080px according to our Web Designer. However, that would also depend on how the photo was taken. Nevertheless, we can always update the images for you. All you need to do is to provide us with the images together with the Title and Description.

Hi Rica

I added photos but they are too big in the slider.

Is there an easy way to reduce their size or am I better off getting you to do that?

Sorry!!! Nothing is eve as easy as it could be.

Regards

Shonagh

Shonagh Kelly

Sales Manager

Consumer Division

T: 61 2 8811 3710

F:61 2 8811 3799

E:shonagh@kellycompany.com.au

Hello Shonagh,

You can edit the sliding photos by going to the LayerSlider WP tab on the WP Admin Dashboard of the site. 

See:


If you are having difficulties in changing the sliding photos, you can send us the photos you would like to display on the slideshow together with the Title and Description so we could add them on the backend.

Hi Rica

That looks great.

Can you advise how I can change the products in the sliding photos?

Most of them are not products we are currently selling, but are instead sold in the USA.

Regards

Shonagh

Hi Shonagh, 

Hope you had a great weekend!

Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review. 

Here is the link: 
https://smartlivinghg.com.au/

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.
